sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均可表示"在前的"之意。
means: previous ： 指时间上、顺序上较早的，或指正在谈论的某事的前一个。
foregoing ： 指前所述的，是following的反义词。
preceding ： 特指时间和地位上紧接在前。
prior与previous同义，常可换用，但prior有时强调更大的重要性，对比意味强。
former系latter的反义词，比prior更着重对比。

sentence.Network_en: The unemployed executives include former sales managers, directors and accountants.
sentence.Network_cn: 被解雇的管理人员包括前销售经理、主管和会计。

sentence.Network_en: A former associate of Mr. Pierce's was among the project's boosters.
sentence.Network_cn: 皮尔斯先生的一个前合伙人是这个计划的热心支持者之一。

sentence.Network_en: The former owner had not left any forwarding address.
sentence.Network_cn: 以前的房主没有留下任何转递地址。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... form n. 表格；形式；结构 former a. 以前的，从前的；（两者之中的）前者 fortnight n. 十四日，两星期.
大学英语精读单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... unknown a. 不知道的， 未知名的 former a. 以前的 farmhouse n. 农舍， 农家.
高中英语必修2_百度百科 ... mystery n. 神秘;神秘的事物 former adj. 以前的;从前的 rebuild vt. 重建.
Putin himself is a 16 - year and former chief the Federal Security Service , known the FSB ., 普京自己就曾是有 16年克罗勃生涯的前联邦安全局的首领 . 以 FSB 知名.

石油英语词汇(C4) ... coil drag 螺旋捞矛 coil former 线圈架 coil heat exchanger 蛇形管换热器；盘管换热器.
牛津高中英语模块一（第1讲） ... old “老的、从前的”。例如: former president 前总统， past experience 以往的经验，.
北京市海淀区人民政府外事办公室 ... 管理处 Administrative Office 故居 Former Residence 收藏 Collection.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old English forma (see foremost) + -er

entry.def: Former is used to describe someone who used to have a particular job, position, or role, but no longer has it.

example.ex: The unemployed executives include former sales managers, directors and accountants.
example.tran: 被解雇的管理人员包括前销售经理、主管和会计。

entry.def: Former is used to refer to countries which no longer exist or whose boundaries have changed.
Former is used to describe something which used to belong to someone or which used to be a particular thing.

example.ex: ...the former home of Sir Christopher Wren.
example.tran: 克里斯托弗·雷恩爵士的旧居

entry.def: Former is used to describe a situation or period of time which came before the present one.

example.ex: He would want you to remember him as he was in former years.
example.tran: 他可能会希望你记住他早年的样子。

entry.def: When two people, things, or groups have just been mentioned, you can refer to the first of them as the former .

example.ex: Given the choice between a pure white T-shirt and a more expensive, dirty cream one, most people can be forgiven for choosing the former...
example.tran: 如果要在一件纯白的 T 恤和一件更贵的脏兮兮的米色 T 恤之间选择的话，多数人都会选前者，这是无可厚非的。

example.ex: If the family home and joint pension rights are of equal value, the wife may choose the former and the husband the latter.
example.tran: 如果家庭住房和共同养老金具有同样的价值，妻子可能会选前者，而丈夫会选后者。

means.word_mean: 1. the first of two or the first mentioned of two;

sentences.sentence: "Tom and Dick were both heroes but only the former is remembered today"

means.word_mean: 1. referring to the first of two things or persons mentioned (or the earlier one or ones of several);

sentences.sentence: "the novel was made into a film in 1943 and again in 1967; I prefer the former version to the latter one"

means.word_mean: 3. (used especially of persons) of the immediate past;

sentences.sentence: "our late President is still very active"
"the previous occupant of the White House"

auth_sentence.res_content: The former president turned out to be a coward.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The former president turned out to be a coward.

auth_sentence.content: He returned to his former career as a lawyer.
auth_sentence.res_content: He returned to his former career as a lawyer.

Sentence.sentence: Global warming is causing more than 300,000 deaths and about $125 billion in economic losses each year, according to a report by the Global Humanitarian Forum, an organization led by Annan, the former United Nations secretary general.
As former Dean of Harvard College.
Jack White, the former front man of the White Stripes and an influential figure among fellow musicians, likes to make things difficult for himself.
Former George Washington University president Stephen Trachtenberg estimates that a typical college uses its facilities for academic purposes a little more than half the calendar year.

means.word_mean: 过去的, 在前的, 以前的

sentences.en: Some of them bitterly attacked their former friends.
sentences.cn: 他们中有些人恶毒地攻击他们过去的朋友。

sentences.en: The former option favours the married man.
sentences.cn: 前一种选择对已婚男子有利

jushi.english: It was the former capital of Turkey.
jushi.chinese: 这是土耳其过去的首都。

jushi.english: Some of them bitter attacked their former friends.
jushi.chinese: 他们中有些人恶毒地攻击他们过去的朋友。
